content:
As a result of the criminal acts of the enemy during artillery shelling, 3 civilians were injured, a high -rise building, private dwellings, unbrokenness were damaged.

About thisreported March 24Defense forces of South of Ukraine.

According to their data, enemy troops hit the artillery in Kherson 7 times, also fired at Berislav, Mikhailivka, Tokarivka, Lviv, Kachkarivka, Snazivka, Golden Beam, Mykilskoe, Antonivka, Belozerka, Pervomai, Garden, Konova, Kizomysk, Konogovka. , Oleksandrivka and Stanislav.

In Zaporizhzhya enemy artillery fired Gulyaipole, Malynivka, Mala Tokmachka, Robne, Levadne, Novoandriivka and Chervonodniprovka.

Housing and infrastructure are damaged. There are no casualties among the population.

In the Dnieper region, the enemy fired at Nikopol, Marganets and Pokrovsk community.

People were not injured.

Asreported the armyinform, the enemy caused more than one and a half thousand beats a day in Donetsk.
title: Kherson region was fired at enemy artillery more than 20 times
description: This was reported on March 24 by defense forces of southern Ukraine. According to them, hostile troops ...
author: Army Inform
